    Tutorials and How-to

    DISROPT - Basic Usage and Charging of Plug-in Electric Vehicles (PEVs)

    In this tutorial, we will see how to implement and run distributed algorithms for the Charging of Plug-in Electric Vehicles scenario using the DISROPT toolbox. We will delve into the main classes of DISROPT and see how to modify them to implement a distributed optimization algorithm. Click here to proceed.
